name: EXMO - shrink whitespace
description:
I made this style for myself - need to see current rates and last trades without scrolling, so I just reduced padding, etc. to be able to see at least 5-6 last trades. Also red button "Cancel orders" is hidden - I tend to mouse over it and it stays on screen displaying its drop-down menu.

Looks best at 90% zoom in the browser.
To utilize Google Exo 2 font you need to uncomment one line in the style because @import is not allowed at userstyles.org
additional_info:
11-Nov-2017 - initial version
30-Nov-2017 - more white space shrinking, font replaced with Google Exo2: you need to uncomment one line in the style because @import is not allowed at userstyles.org
1-Dec-2017 - more font-weight tuning, price/amount/sum columns width tuning
14-Feb-2018 - EXMO introduced new interface. Style reworked from scratch: main "window" moved left to allow wider chat on the right, comments added
15-Feb-2018 - chat width increased to 500px. I recommend using EXMO with zoom 90%, at least with 1920+ width monitors
06-Mar-2018 - tuned cells padding in orders/pairs tables
04-Apr-2018 - whitespace after orders increased a bit for better readability (10px -> 25px)
27-Sep-2018 - fix auction pairs window height, decrease header row height
